title: Karen Civil Interview and Ex Files
itunes:title: Karen Civil Interview and Ex Files
description:
Tuesday 6/27- Today on the show Karen Civil stopped by and talked about her racy photo, cleared the rumors about her and Remy Ma beef and more. In addition, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to John McEnroe because his comments on Serena Williams and we opened up the phone to let our listeners air out their exes dirty laundry during Ex Files.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
